Publish.LongDescription:
Description:
Enhance your city-building experience with the Clock Mod for Cities: Skylines 2. This essential mod introduces a sleek, real-time clock to the lower right corner of your interface, keeping you seamlessly informed of the current real world time without interrupting your immersive gameplay.
Features:
Live Clock Display: The mod adds a functional real-time clock to your HUD showing the exact time of day in real life.
Subtle Integration: The clock is strategically placed in the lower right corner of the interface, ensuring it remains unobtrusive while being easily visible for quick time checks.
Compatibility: Designed to work smoothly with other popular mods and expansions, ensuring a hassle-free addition to your existing setup.
Stay on top of your city's daily rhythm and master your own time management with the Clock mod. Perfect for those who like to plan ahead while keeping their city running like a well-oiled machine.
